name: wc-polymer-stencil-todo
description: Comparison on how to update DOM, pass attributes/properties and dispatch/listen to events with Web Components

scripts.build:polymer: cd polymer && polymer build && rm -fr ../dist/polymer2 && mv build/es6-bundled ../dist/polymer2
scripts.build:angular: cd angular-elements && npm run build && rm -fr ../dist/angular-elements && mv dist ../dist/angular-elements
scripts.build:skatejs:lit-html: cd skatejs-lit-html && npm run build && rm -fr ../dist/skatejs-lit-html && mkdir ../dist/skatejs-lit-html && mv dist ../dist/skatejs-lit-html && cp index.html ../dist/skatejs-lit-html
scripts.build:skatejs:preact: cd skatejs-preact && npm run build && rm -fr ../dist/skatejs-preact && mkdir ../dist/skatejs-preact && mv dist ../dist/skatejs-preact && cp index.html ../dist/skatejs-preact
scripts.build:stencil: cd stencil && npm run build && rm -fr ../dist/stencil && mv www ../dist/stencil
scripts.build:vue: cd vue && npm run build && rm -fr ../dist/vue && mv dist ../dist/vue
scripts.build:all: npm run build:index && npm run build:native && npm run build:polymer && npm run build:angular && npm run build:stencil && npm run build:vue && npm run build:skatejs:lit-html && npm run build:skatejs:preact

author: shprink <julien.renaux@gmail.com>
